components.description: The letter A, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter A

components.description: The letter C, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C

description: The flag for Ascension Island, which may show as the letters AC on some platforms. Apple devices show the St. Helena flag for both Ascension Island and Tristan Da Cunha.
title: Flag: Ascension Island

emoji_net_data.definition: The flag for Ascension Island, which may show as the letters AC on some platforms. ThisÂ same flag is used forÂ St. HelenaÂ andÂ Tristan Da Cunh http://emojipedia.org/flag-for-ascension-island/
emoji_net_data.name: Ascension Island

bn:01159763n: An island in the South Atlantic that is a British dependency of Saint Helena.

Ascension Island is an isolated volcanic island in the equatorial waters of the South Atlantic Ocean, around from the coast of Africa and from the coast of South America, which is roughly midway between the horn of South America and Africa.
An island in the southern Atlantic Ocean
An island in the South Atlantic.
Island in the South Atlantic Ocean

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
